Comments_List: I was given valuable feedback for my presentation this semester. Josephina also spent a lot of time curating my classmates' feedback into an easily digestible format for me after the presentation. I appreciate the time and hard work she put in this class.
How to critically evaluate scientific presentations
Stop making everything mandatory. It really takes away from the point of this course.

The introductory class (the first class of the semester) was a bit too long and drawn out. The wealth of information clearly came from a place of caring, however, as Josephina and David clearly wanted to make sure we were all aware of proper presentation etiquette. I appreciate that
Weakness - It would be helpful if the link for the feedback survey was provided at least once through email at the beginning of the semester
Yes, Josephina was very engaged and put a lot of time and effort into the class and giving us all valuable feedback.
